name: Gleam Development Environment
postCreateCommand: apt-get update && apt-get install -y curl jq && curl -L -o gleam.tar.gz "https://github.com/gleam-lang/gleam/releases/download/v1.11.1/gleam-v1.11.1-x86_64-unknown-linux-musl.tar.gz" && tar -xzf gleam.tar.gz -C /usr/local/bin && rm gleam.tar.gz && gleam deps download
